name: Tichu-Counter
description:
Tichu Counter keeps track of the score and the histories of all your Tichu games. Additionally it creates individual player and team statistics in order to help you to improve your gameplay.
Here are the best features of Tichu Counter:

* Simple User Interface
* History of all your Tichu Games
* Ranking of Players and Teams in different categories
* Individual Player and Team Statistics
* Variable Score Limit

Tichu Counter is the Tichu App you've always been looking for!





All used icons and the app icon itself are downloaded from www.flaticon.com.
